author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-4343: Added isUseAdviceWith to test kit. This helps the test kit to not start Camel before the adviceWith. Meaning we can advice before Camel is started.

author: jlmonteiro
msg: OPENEJB-1312 Remove the SecurityException catch block to prevent invalid state of the object. Moreover the catch block does not contain anything so the exception is silently ignore which is not relevant because it will result in an unpredictable behavior. Thanks Mark!
